alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 03 at 3:24AM MDT until April 06 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...South Lincoln County, Rock Springs and Green River, Flaming Gorge and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County
